flavorText:
"This undemanding vegetation takes root in a mote of dust but grows incredibly quickly."
—Simic research notes

foreignData.flavorText: „Diese anspruchslose Vegetation benötigt nur ein kleinstes Staubkorn, in das sie ihre Wurzeln schlagen kann, und wächst dann unglaublich schnell." —Notizen von Simic-Forschern
foreignData.name: Lebendes Blätterdach
foreignData.text:
Bringe einen 1/1 grünen Saprolingspielstein ins Spiel, der eine Kreatur deiner Wahl blockt, die dich angreift.
Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: "Esta modesta vegetación echa raíces en una mota de polvo pero crece increíblemente rápido." —Notas de investigación simic
foreignData.name: Fronda repentina
foreignData.text:
Pon en juego una ficha de criatura Saprolín verde 1/1 bloqueando a la criatura objetivo que te está atacando.
Roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: « Cette végétation nécessitant peu d'entretien prend racine sur une simple poussière et grandit à une vitesse incroyable. » —Notes de recherche des Simic
foreignData.name: Feuillage immédiat
foreignData.text:
Mettez en jeu un jeton de créature 1/1 verte Saprobionte bloquant la créature ciblée qui vous attaque.
Piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: "Questa vegetazione selvaggia attecchisce anche su un granello di polvere, ma cresce a una velocità incredibile." —Note di ricerca dei Simic
foreignData.name: Fogliame Balenante
foreignData.text:
Metti in gioco una pedina creatura Saprolingio 1/1 verde a bloccare una creatura bersaglio che ti sta attaccando.
Pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: この植物は多くを必要とせず、根を下ろすためのわずかな塵があれば信じられない速度で成長する。 ――シミックの研究メモ
foreignData.name: 瞬間群葉
foreignData.text:
あなたを攻撃しているクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをブロックしている緑の１/１の苗木クリーチャー・トークンを１体場に出す。
カードを１枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: "Esta modesta vegetação enraíza-se com apenas um punhado de terra, mas cresce incrivelmente rápido." — notas de pesquisa Simic
foreignData.name: Folhagem Ofuscante
foreignData.text:
Coloque em jogo uma ficha de criatura verde 1/1 do tipo Saprófita bloqueando a criatura alvo que o está atacando.
Compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText: "Эта неприхотливая зелень укореняется в пылинке, но растет с поразительной быстротой". —Исследовательские записки Симиков
foreignData.name: Внезапная листва
foreignData.text:
Введите в игру фишку зеленого существа Сапролинга 1/1 блокирующим целевое существо, нападающее на вас.
Возьмите карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 「此类植株极富韧性，只要有颗尘埃可生根，就能快速成长。」 ～析米克研究纪录
foreignData.name: 突现叶网
foreignData.text:
将一个1/1绿色腐生物衍生物放置进场，且对目标攻击你的生物进行阻挡。
抓一张牌。

name: Flash Foliage
originalText:
Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play blocking target creature attacking you.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: Putting a blocking creature onto the battlefield will trigger “When this creature becomes blocked by a creature” abilities. It may trigger “When this creature becomes blocked” abilities, but only if the creature the Saproling is blocking had not yet been blocked that combat.
The Saproling token is blocking the attacking creature, even if the block couldn’t legally be declared (for example, if the attacking creature has flying, or is Vindictive Mob).

Flash Foliage can be cast only during an opponent’s combat phase, after attackers have been declared. If it’s cast after combat damage is dealt, the Saproling will enter the battlefield blocking the attacking creature, but will neither deal combat damage to it nor be dealt combat damage by it.
The target creature can be blocked by other creatures.
Putting a blocking creature onto the battlefield doesn’t trigger “When this creature blocks” abilities. It also won’t check blocking restrictions, costs, or requirements.
With the latest Oracle update, you can only cast this during combat, after blockers have been declared.
If a turn has multiple combat phases, this spell can be cast during any of them as long as it’s after the beginning of that phase’s Declare Blockers Step.

text:
Cast this spell only during combat after blockers are declared.
Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token that's blocking target creature attacking you.
Draw a card.
